name: Car Rental Service
desciption: An API service built for car rental system using Nodejs, MongoDB (Atlas cloud) and Expressjs. The server is currently deployed on Heroku.

name: Dictionary
desciption: An English Dictionary application built as a client-server application. The server is built with Nodejs, MongoDB cloud and Expressjs hosted on Heroku, whereas the client is a CLI tool built with Commanderjs

name: Industry Cooling Automation
desciption: An IoT project developed to enable automation of cooling system in manufacturing industry.

name: Academic Suite
desciption: A web application built for academic institutions for maintaining useful academic resources and sharing them with students. The whole system is based on client-server architecture and once deployed, it doesn't require internet connectivity.
